# Test multiple key insertions and lookups

# Start the test server
startserver

# Insert multiple keys
insertkey alice@example.com age1qyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqs3290pe
insertkey bob@example.com age1zvkyg2lqzraa2lnjvqej32nkuu0ues2s82hzrye869xeexvn73eqz96p3z
insertkey charlie@example.com age1lggyhqrw2nlhcxprm67z43rta597azn8gknawjehu9d9dl0jq3yqqvfafg

# Lookup each key
age-keyserver alice@example.com
stdout 'age1qyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqs3290pe'

age-keyserver bob@example.com
stdout 'age1zvkyg2lqzraa2lnjvqej32nkuu0ues2s82hzrye869xeexvn73eqz96p3z'

age-keyserver charlie@example.com
stdout 'age1lggyhqrw2nlhcxprm67z43rta597azn8gknawjehu9d9dl0jq3yqqvfafg'

# Stop the server
stopserver
